tasks.task: Farming Scene with Animal Finger Families
subtasks: Enacting farm scene with fingers representing animals
Acting out finding and greeting Cow Finger, Dog Finger, Sheep Finger, Chicken Finger, and Pig Finger
Mimicking animal sounds (moo, quack, ba-ba-ba, quack, coink)
Spreading out and moving around to find the pig
Participating in finger family greetings and singing along
Engaging in finger family actions like mooing, quacking, etc.
Watching the video until the end
